com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.crx

Interface ArchiveHelper

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CRXArchiveHelper

    public interface ArchiveHelper
    Implementations read and write CRX archives.
    Since:
    1.1.0
    Author:
    Brian Matthews

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      CRXArchive readArchive(File crxFile)
      Read the CRX archive from a file loading the header, public key, signature and data.
      void writeArchive(File crxFile, CRXArchive crxArchive)
      Generate the CRX file writing the header, public key, signature and data.

    • Method Detail

      • writeArchive

        void writeArchive(File crxFile,
                CRXArchive crxArchive)
                  throws IOException
        Generate the CRX file writing the header, public key, signature and data.
        Parameters:
        crxFile - The target CRX file.
        crxArchive - The CRX archive.
        Throws:
        IOException - If there was an error writing the CRX file.

      • readArchive

        CRXArchive readArchive(File crxFile)
                       throws IOException
        Read the CRX archive from a file loading the header, public key, signature and data.
        Parameters:
        crxFile - The source CRX file.
        Returns:
        The CRX archive.
        Throws:
        IOException - If there was an error reading the CRX file.
